channel.title: HOW ? - Automatic server setting on client and killing all NPC's (need help)
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Does anyone know how to automatically set the server into a client, for example, instead of having to do File->Server IP-> blah blah, it's just there already? :)
Also, does anyone know the code to kill all npc's ... like.. ::killnpc.. all npc's die and respawn? or reset npcs.. anything like that.
Thanks :)
( I know how to do commands etc, i just need the killnpc code )

item.title: HOW ? - Automatic server setting on client and killing all NPC's (need help)
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Hmm, efil…

should that code just work with any set up i have? or do i need to set some variables?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2009, 04:17:40 pm[/size][hr]NOOOO LOL :eek:

…

"illegal start of expression
}
"

… that could be any of the million odd in the code omfg… i guess there isnt a way of finding it? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2009, 04:32:28 pm[/size][hr]Fixed it

item.source: HOW ? - Automatic server setting on client and killing all NPC's (need help)

item.title: HOW ? - Automatic server setting on client and killing all NPC's (need help)
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

For the “All Npc die and respawn” add this to your commands

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && playerRights > 1){ for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2627 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2631 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2741 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2743 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2746 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2738 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3777 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3778 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3779 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3780){ server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = false; } else server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; }}
Play with it a little, I just whipped this one up quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: HOW ? - Automatic server setting on client and killing all NPC's (need help)
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

There is a file called EGUI.java if you open that and type your server IP in the quotation marks.
Once you done that go into client.java and find

setserver("

Enter your server IP there.

Then again find

server = "

And then enter your server IP again.

Read full topic
